text: Murrells Inlet is an unincorporated area and census-designated place between Horry and Georgetown Counties in South Carolina, United States. The population was 9,740 at the 2020 census. It is most known for the Murrells Inlet Marshwalk, a boardwalk overlooking a salt marsh and which houses many restaurants. ==References== Category:Unincorporated communities in the United States Category:Census-designated places in South Carolina
title: Murrells Inlet, South Carolina
